data.about: I discovered my passion for computer science when I was a sophomore in High School; it was then, when I started learning more for my passion. I am pursuing my bachelor's degree at Avantika University, major in Computer science and engineering. A year later I was introduced to Embedded systems, where I discovered the love for electrics and electronics and also for embedded systems. Then I got a scholarship opportunity to do a research work on Smart grid and started the never-ending journey of becoming a developer along with sharpening my eye for innovations.
